name: Fazeshift
headline: AI agent for Accounts Receivable
description:
Fazeshift is an AI agent for automating Accounts Receivable. What used to take teams of people and hours of manual work can now be fully automated with Fazeshift. 

Caitlin and Timmy met while getting their MBA at Harvard. After graduating, they started a B2B marketing software startup, which is where they first experienced the pain of this process.

The problem stems from fragmented data across software platforms like QuickBooks, Stripe, NetSuite, DocuSign, HubSpot, and Salesforce. Fazeshift’s infrastructure connects the data across these software platforms and uses LLMs to automate the previously manual workflow.

founders.name: Caitlin Leksana, Founder
founders.description: Caitlin is the co-founder and CEO of Fazeshift. Before Fazeshift, Caitlin was CEO of a crypto marketing automation startup where she sold to global enterprises including Square Enix, dYdX, and the founder of Marvel Studios. She spent 2 years as a consultant at BCG advising tech companies on product, operations, and pricing strategy. She received her MBA from Harvard Business School and has a deep personal understanding of the operational pain points that Fazeshift has set out to solve.

founders.name: Timmy Galvin, Founder
founders.description: Timmy is the co-founder and CTO of Fazeshift.  He previously worked at a fintech startup using AI to automate bank operations and financial services.  Timmy holds two computer science degrees from MIT and an MBA from Harvard Business School.  He served for seven years as a nuclear submarine officer in the US Navy, taught cybersecurity at the US Naval Academy, and holds a software patent for data algorithms.

# AI-powered Accounts Receivable for the enterprise.
Fazeshift is the comprehensive, AI-driven solution that automates invoicing, cash application, and collections - helping you improve cash flow and scale efficiently.
[Speak to an expert](https://www.fazeshift.com/</contact>)
![Hero Image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66141f8a4a15cea5e1073990/6616ebf736e175c000a4a7e4_Screenshot%202024-04-10%20at%203.43.33%E2%80%AFPM.png)![Hero Image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66141f8a4a15cea5e1073990/6616f7714b65ddcdd75c00b9_Asset%2012%20main%20asset%20R.png)![Hero Image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66141f8a4a15cea5e1073990/674cae4f286577567848614d_Asset%2030Sync%20Asset%20V2.png)

# A TEAM FROM WORLD CLASS INSTITUTIONS

## Your complete solution for AI-powered Accounts Receivable - Smarter. Faster. Easier.
From contract to payment, automate your entire Accounts Receivable process with Fazeshift.
![AR Reduction Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66141f8a4a15cea5e1073990/67684edfb73c68e3a299bc5a_graphic3.png)
### 90%
AR Cost Reduction
![Time Savings Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66141f8a4a15cea5e1073990/67684ee055a973c3bfac9d16_graphic2.png)
### 90%
Time Savings
![Streamline Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66141f8a4a15cea5e1073990/67684edef85eec6325967bfc_graphic4.png)
### 50%
DSOs Reduction
![Cashflow Lift Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66141f8a4a15cea5e1073990/67684ee02837d8afcf23088f_graphic1.png)
### 5x
Cashflow Uplift
### Turn sales contracts into invoices in seconds
Extract complex billing terms and convert contracts into invoices instantly - saving time and boosting accuracy.
  * Auto-process customer and contract data with AI
  * Manage variable billing terms with ease
  * Error-free invoices with built-in validation


![Contract Extraction Diagram](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66141f8a4a15cea5e1073990/6768572999d9ecd4d9dc92e8_Asset%201Contract%20Extraction.png)
### Eliminate manual payment matching
Know exactly what's paid and what's overdue with automated cash application.
  * Match payments automatically, no matter the method - ACH, Wire, Credit Card, or Check
  * Sync seamlessly with your accounting software for real-time updates
  * Ensure faster, more accurate matches


![Cash Application Diagram](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66141f8a4a15cea5e1073990/676857c898c458537f66f2d4_Asset%202Cash%20Application.png)
### Get paid on time
Automate your collections and never miss a payment, keeping cash flow predictable and secure.
  * Automated, timely reminders
  * Intelligent escalation workflows
  * Ensure faster payment cycles and reduced DSO


![Workflows Diagram](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66141f8a4a15cea5e1073990/676857a8026786cdd349e679_Asset%201Intelligent%20Collections.png)
## Every Business Faces Unique AR Challenges - Let's Solve Yours
Whether it's complex billing cycles, delayed payments, or reconciliation headaches, Fazeshift adapts to your needs. Schedule a personalized demo to see how we can tackle your specific AR challenges.
[Speak to an expert](https://www.fazeshift.com/</contact>)
## See what success looks like with Fazeshift
![Visibility Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66141f8a4a15cea5e1073990/67685f268abd60f025769a09_icon_visibility.png)
### Complete AR Visibility
Stay in control with real-time notifications and alerts. Know when action is needed to keep your A/R process running smoothly.
![Automation Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66141f8a4a15cea5e1073990/67685f26717640eb15dffb92_icon_automation.png)
### Intelligent Process Automation
Eliminate busywork and empower your team to focus on high-impact, strategic tasks.
![Cash flow Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66141f8a4a15cea5e1073990/67685f27c39ce9e70bb52fbe_icon_cashflow.png)
### Stronger Cash Flow Management
Reduce delays, shorten DSO, and improve your cash flow to support long-term scalable growth.
## One click integrations with tools you are already using
Get up and running using your existing software systems for minimal disruptions and easy implementation. Seamlessly integrate in minutes.

![Customization Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66141f8a4a15cea5e1073990/67686399789cf6be925cc10b_icon_customize.png)
### Customize to your requirements
Configure AI workflows to deliver high-quality results that meet your requirements. From onboarding to optimization, our AI experts are here to ensure your financial operations run smoothly.
![Security Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66141f8a4a15cea5e1073990/67686399d4d68e13066e71b9_icon_security.png)![SOC security & compliance badge](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66141f8a4a15cea5e1073990/6768665e55a973c3bfbd0af5_aicpa-soc-logo-freelogovectors.net_-PNG.png)
### Stay secure and compliant
Fazeshift adheres to global privacy laws and security standards, such as SOC 2 and PCI. Our robust security framework ensures your data remains safe, providing you with peace of mind for your financial operations.
## Replace Manual AR Tasks with AI Automation. Save Time and Money.
Fazeshift automates every step of your AR process, from invoicing to cash application and collections, reducing errors and empowering your team to focus on high-value strategic tasks.

generated_description:
### Fazeshift: Revolutionizing Accounts Receivable with AI

**Overview:**
Fazeshift, a San Francisco-based startup, is redefining the world of accounts receivable (AR) automation through its cutting-edge AI technology. Founded in 2023 by Caitlin and Timmy, both MBA graduates from Harvard, this company emerged from the founders' firsthand experiences with the convoluted and labor-intensive processes of AR management. Today, Fazeshift stands as part of Y Combinator's Batch S24, signaling both credibility and potential for growth.

**Mission:**
Fazeshift's mission is clear: to empower businesses by automating the accounts receivable process. The tools that used to require hours of manual labor and multiple team members can now perform their tasks almost instantaneously, thanks to Fazeshift’s AI agent. 

**Challenges Addressed:**
Many businesses grapple with fragmented data across various software platforms such as QuickBooks, Stripe, DocuSign, HubSpot, and Salesforce. Fazeshift tackles this problem head-on by integrating and connecting data from these platforms, thereby streamlining the AR workflow and reducing the risk of human error.

**Core Features:**
1. **Automation of Invoicing:** Transform sales contracts into invoices instantly with AI, ensuring prompt billing and payment.
2. **Cash Application:** Automatically match payments regardless of the method (ACH, wire, credit card, or check), providing companies with real-time updates and accuracy.
3. **Collections Management:** Automate reminders and follow-ups, creating intelligent workflows for faster payment cycles while reducing days sales outstanding (DSO) by up to 50%.
4. **Integration-Friendly:** Fazeshift seamlessly connects with existing tools in your tech stack to minimize disruption and streamline implementation.

**Benefits:**
- **Cost Reduction:** Businesses experience up to 90% reduction in AR costs.
- **Time Savings:** Up to 90% time savings compared to traditional processes.
- **Cash Flow Improvement:** Achieve up to 5x cash flow uplift, making a tangible difference in financial health.

**Security and Compliance:**
Fazeshift takes security seriously, adhering to global privacy laws and standards like SOC 2 and PCI compliance to safeguard sensitive financial data.

**The Founders' Vision:**
Caitlin and Timmy are committed to simplifying AR processes for businesses of all sizes. Their experiences in B2B marketing demonstrated the pains associated with managing invoicing and collections, fueling their resolve to create a more efficient solution.

With a lean team of just two employees, Fazeshift is poised for rapid growth as it aims to help businesses face unique AR challenges. The founders also enjoy backing from Garry Tan, a respected figure in the startup ecosystem.

If you’re interested in transforming your financial operations and enhancing your company's cash flow management, visit Fazeshift at [fazeshift.com](https://www.fazeshift.com/) to learn more or schedule a demo. 

In short, Fazeshift isn't just a product; it's a game-changer for anyone serious about financial efficiency.
